commit.message:
Cleaning up useless static imports and usage of pre-3.1 commons-lang

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/branches/1_1_X@1543345 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -48,8 +48,8 @@ under the License.
     </dependency>
 
     <dependency>
-      <groupId>commons-lang</groupId>
-      <artifactId>commons-lang</artifactId>
+      <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
+      <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
     </dependency>
 
     <dependency>
@@ -92,7 +92,7 @@ under the License.
               org.apache.syncope.common*;version=${project.version};-split-package:=merge-first
             </Export-Package>
             <Import-Package>
-              org.apache.commons.lang*;version="[2.6,3)",
+              org.apache.commons.lang3;version="[3,4)",
               org.codehaus.jackson.annotate;version="[1.9,2)",
               org.springframework*;version="[3,4)",
               ch.qos.logback.classic;resolution:=optional,

@@ -56,6 +56,11 @@ under the License.
       <scope>provided</scope>
     </dependency>
 
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
+      <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
+    </dependency>
+
     <dependency>
       <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
       <artifactId>slf4j-api</artifactId>
@@ -316,7 +321,7 @@ under the License.
                   javax.servlet,
                   javax.xml*,
                   org.w3c.dom,
-                  org.apache.commons.lang*;version="[2.6,3)",
+                  org.apache.commons.lang3;version="[3,4)",
                   org.apache.http*;version="[4,5)",
                   org.apache.syncope.client*;version=${project.version},
                   org.apache.syncope.common*;version=${project.version},

@@ -585,7 +585,6 @@ under the License.
                   org.apache.commons.collections.keyvalue;version="[3.2,4)",
                   org.apache.commons.io;version="[1.3,2)",
                   org.apache.commons.jexl2*;version="[2.1,3)",
-                  org.apache.commons.lang;version="[2.6,3)",
                   org.apache.commons.lang3;version="[3,4)",
                   org.apache.openjpa*;version="[2,3)",
                   org.apache.syncope.common*;version=${project.version},

@@ -304,7 +304,7 @@ under the License.
     <connid.ad.version>1.1.1</connid.ad.version>
 
     <commons-jexl.version>2.1.1</commons-jexl.version>
-    <commons-lang.version>2.6</commons-lang.version>
+    <commons-lang.version>3.1</commons-lang.version>
         
     <hc.client.version>4.2.6</hc.client.version>
 
@@ -412,8 +412,8 @@ under the License.
       </dependency>
 
       <dependency>
-        <groupId>commons-lang</groupId>
-        <artifactId>commons-lang</artifactId>
+        <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
+        <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
         <version>${commons-lang.version}</version>
       </dependency>
